message: In general, we're wondering how many people are trying to promote themselves via humor as opposed to traditional means via money ... this is an area we're exploring for Panabee and would love feedback on the video (http://www.panabee.com/name-domain-name/videos) and FAQ (http://www.panabee.com/panabee)
Are there good examples of companies marketing themselves with humor instead of money?
If you're curious, the FAQ evolved because some people actually asked some of the questions ... and we thought those questions were ridiculous, so we decided to write ridiculous responses.
BTW, the video also explains why techcrunch chose not to cover us ... hope you find it amusing. :)
@lloyd, that's the only thing? haha, ok, maybe we'll shorten the video and cut out other segments. thx for the feedback!
Oh no it was good. I just liked that the software messed up :D
we are thinking about shortening the video tho ... which sections would you cut out?
oh, we did that on purpose. :)
